Package ru.rsreu.kuznecovsokolov12.datalayer

Interface MessageAttachingDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OracleMessageAttachingDAO
    public interface MessageAttachingDAO
    This interface provides methods for attaching messages to specific commands.

    This interface defines methods for retrieving different types of message attachments (undeleted, deleted, and both) and for attaching messages to commands.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addMessage​(MessageAttaching messageAttach)
      Attaches a message to a command.
      java.util.Set<MessageAttaching> getAllDeletedMessageAttachs()
      Retrieves all attachments of deleted messages.
      java.util.List<MessageAttaching> getAllMessageAttachs()
      Retrieves all attachments of both deleted and undeleted messages.
      java.util.List<MessageAttaching> getAllUndeletedMessageAttachs()
      Retrieves all attachments of undeleted messages.

      • getAllMessageAttachs

        java.util.List<MessageAttaching> getAllMessageAttachs()
                                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Retrieves all attachments of both deleted and undeleted messages.
        Returns:
        A list of all attachments of messages, both deleted and undeleted.
        Throws:
